data.title: What Is The Qualification Required To Enroll In This Course?
data: Enrollment in our program is open to individuals from all backgrounds, providing an inclusive learning opportunity. While there is no age restriction, for those seeking guaranteed interviews, a minimum qualification of 12th pass is required.

For learners of any age, you have the opportunity to acquire valuable skills through our 15 Days Job Ready Program. This program empowers you to connect with recruiters actively seeking candidates of all ages. Whether you are a 12th pass, college student, graduate, or anyone else, this program offers insights into effective job searching, crafting professional resumes, direct communication with company HR, and strategies for ensuring your resume stands out in every application. These skills will undoubtedly enhance your chances of being shortlisted for interviews and securing a job.

Our program is designed to welcome individuals of any age group, fostering an inclusive learning environment. There are no age restrictions for enrollment. While guaranteed interviews are not applicable for candidates aged 35 and above, you can still benefit from our 15 Days Job Ready Program. This comprehensive program enables you to learn and connect with recruiters actively hiring candidates of all ages. Whether you are a 12th pass, college student, graduate, or from any other background, this program equips you with essential skills such as effective job searching, creating professional resumes, direct engagement with company HR, and strategies to ensure your resume stands out in every application. These acquired skills significantly improve your chances of being shortlisted for interviews and securing a job.

data.title: Can We Access This Course On Both Mobile and Laptop?
data: Yes, you can access the course on both Mobile & Laptop.

data.title: What Is The Age Criteria Required To Enroll In This Course?
Age Requirements for Course Enrollment
data: Enrollment in this program is open to individuals of any age, fostering an inclusive learning environment. However, for those seeking guaranteed interviews and taking the Skill Based Test, it is essential that the age is below 35 years. If your age exceeds 35 years, you are still eligible to learn from us, although guaranteed interviews may not be applicable. Nonetheless, through our 15 Days Job Ready Program, participants of all ages can acquire valuable skills and connect with company recruiters actively hiring candidates above the age of 35.

data.title: Moreover, irrespective of age, this program equips you with essential knowledge:
data: Discover effective job search strategies in your domain.
Learn how to create a professional, industry-ready resume/CV.
Develop the skills to directly communicate with any company's HR.
Understand how to ensure your resume gets shortlisted in every company.
Access free resume templates and much more.

data.title: These acquired skills are designed to enhance your chances of being shortlisted in interviews and securing a job, regardless of your age.
Enrollment Age Criteria Variation:
data: People of any age are welcome to enroll in our program, promoting inclusivity in learning. To be eligible for guaranteed interviews and the Skill Based Test, it's required that the age is below 35 years. However, if you're above 35 years, you are still permitted to enroll and learn from us, although guaranteed interviews may not be available. Nonetheless, through our 15 Days Job Ready Program, individuals of all age groups can gain valuable skills and connect with company recruiters actively hiring candidates aged 35 and above.

data.title: Furthermore, irrespective of age, this program imparts essential knowledge:
data: Gain insights into effective job search techniques in your field.
Master the art of creating a professional, industry-ready resume/CV.
Develop the skills to directly engage with any company's HR.
Understand the strategies to ensure your resume stands out in every company.
Access free resume templates and much more.

data.title: Will I get Guaranteed Job After Completing this course?
Job Guarantee Post Course Completion:
data: Our Boot Camp ensures guaranteed interview opportunities for every eligible student; however, job placement is not guaranteed. Each candidate is entitled to one guaranteed interview opportunity. Additionally, candidates qualifying the Basic Eligibility Test will receive more interview opportunities from our end. It's imperative for candidates to attempt and qualify in the Basic Eligibility test to avail of these additional opportunities. The eligibility criteria for the guaranteed interview include being 12th pass, having an age below 35 years, completing the 15 Days Training, and participating in the Basic Communication Test.

Upon completing our Boot Camp, we assure guaranteed interview opportunities for each eligible student, although job placement is not assured. Each candidate is granted one guaranteed interview opportunity. Furthermore, candidates successfully passing the Basic Eligibility Test will receive extra interview opportunities provided by our platform. It is mandatory for candidates to attempt and qualify in the Basic Eligibility test to avail these additional opportunities. To be eligible for the guaranteed interview, candidates must be 12th pass, have an age below 35 years, complete the 15 Days Training, and participate in the Basic Communication Test.

data.title: This Complete Program Will Be Live / Recorded?
Live vs. Recorded Format of the Program:
data: The entire program is conducted in a live class format, ensuring real-time engagement. However, if you happen to miss a session, you have the flexibility to revisit the class recording. It's crucial to note that access to recorded classes will not be available after the completion of the 2-week training period. Therefore, it's highly recommended to watch all classes within this 2-week timeframe to maximise your learning experience.

data.title: Live Sessions and Class Recordings Overview:
data: The program is exclusively delivered through live classes, fostering active participation. In the event that you miss any session, you have the convenience of accessing the class recordings. It's essential to be aware that access to recorded classes will cease after the 2-week training concludes. As a proactive measure, it is advised to diligently watch all classes within this 2-week duration to optimise the learning potential.

data.title: Can We Connect With Mentors In Case If Any Doubt Arises?
data: Certainly! If you encounter any uncertainties, our Academic Coordinators are here to help. Additionally, we host weekly Live Interactive Q&A sessions with Experts, providing you with a direct opportunity to connect and address any questions you may have. Feel free to reach out to our Academic Coordinators via phone or email for further assistance.

data.title: What Is The Timing Of Classes In This Course?
data: Certainly! The schedule for your classes will be available on your Student Portal Section on our website. Moreover, if you happen to miss a class, you have the flexibility to watch the recording at any time.

data.title: How Many Hours We Require Daily For This Program?
data: For this program, it is recommended to dedicate around 2 to 3 hours daily. This time commitment will allow you to engage with the content thoroughly, participate in any interactive sessions, and work on any assignments or exercises effectively. Allocating this daily timeframe ensures a steady and productive progress throughout the program.

data.title: Can I Get Interview Opportunities For WORK FROM HOME Jobs From This Course?
data: While our Boot Camp doesn't guarantee specific interview opportunities for work-from-home jobs, it equips you with valuable skills. Through the program, you'll gain insights on connecting with recruiters from companies offering remote positions. Additionally, you'll learn essential job-seeking strategies, including crafting a professional resume, contacting HR directly, and enhancing your chances of being shortlisted. The program covers a range of skills to boost your interview readiness and increase your prospects of securing a job in your field.

data.title: What Extra benefits You'll get From This Course?
Apart From Job Ready Training, Guaranteed Interviews, You'll also learn a lots of things from this Boot Camp, Like-
How To Find Jobs In Your Domain
How To Make Professional Industry Ready Resume
How To Directly Contact With Any Company HR
Assessment Test & Versant Test Preparations
How Your Resume Will Be Shortlisted In Every Company {ATS System}
FREE Resume Templates
1:1 Dedicated Support From Our Team
Course Completion Certificate
Interview Tips And Tricks PDF
Job Search Skills: Learn effective strategies for finding jobs within your specific domain.
Resume Building: Acquire the skills to create a professional, industry-ready resume.
Direct Communication: Understand how to establish direct contact with HR professionals from different companies.
Test Preparation: Get ready for assessment tests and Versant tests to enhance your interview readiness.
ATS System Insights: Gain insights into how resumes are shortlisted using Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
Free Resume Templates: Access a collection of free, professionally designed resume templates.
Dedicated Support: Receive personalized 1:1 support from our team throughout the program.
Certificate of Completion: Upon finishing the course, obtain a certificate recognizing your achievement.
Interview Tips and Tricks: Access valuable resources, including a PDF guide on interview tips and tricks.
Explore various other resources and insights to further enhance your job-seeking skills.
I'm Already Working In A Company, So I'm Eligible Or Not ?
data: Certainly! If you're already employed in a company, you are still eligible to enroll in our program. Whether you are seeking to enhance your skills for career advancement within your current job or looking to explore new opportunities, our Boot Camp is designed to accommodate learners with varying levels of professional experience. The comprehensive training and additional resources provided can contribute to your career growth and success in your current role or any future endeavors you may pursue. Feel free to join us and take your professional journey to the next level!

data.title: In Which Domain, You'll Get Interview Opportunities?
data: Certainly! We offer interview opportunities primarily in the Teaching field, Customer Support/BPO, Business Development/Sales, and various IT domains. Additionally, we extend opportunities in Finance and HR domains. If your interest lies in a different domain, our Boot Camp training equips you with the skills and knowledge to explore and secure a fulfilling job in your preferred area. Join us, and we'll assist you in pursuing a career path aligned with your aspirations.

data.title: How Many interview Opportunities Will I Get?
data: Certainly! You are guaranteed at least one interview opportunity aligned with your selected domain. Additionally, for students who excel in the Skill Test, extra interview opportunities will be extended. To ensure eligibility for the guaranteed interview, participation in the Skill Based Test is a must. During the interview period, please remain reachable, as a missed HR call or unavailability will be considered as utilizing one opportunity. Stay engaged and responsive on interview days to make the most of these opportunities.

data.title: Can I Get Interview Opportunity For My Home Location/City?
data: Certainly! While we do have companies in our network that hire for positions across PAN India locations, we cannot guarantee specific interview opportunities in your home location or city. However, the program equips you with the skills to explore job opportunities in your preferred locations. You'll also gain the knowledge to connect with recruiters from companies hiring across PAN India locations.

data.title: What Is The Average Salary Package Should I Expect?
data: The salary package you can expect varies based on factors such as the company, job role, and your skills. It is contingent on these elements, and there isn't a fixed average salary package that applies universally.

data.title: What Is The Course Fee?
data: The course fees are contingent upon the specific course you choose to enroll in. Each course may have a different fee structure. For detailed information on the course fees, you can refer to the specific course details on our website or contact our support team for accurate and up-to-date information.

data.title: If My Communication Skills Are Weak, Will This Course Help Me To Crack Interviews?
data: YES, YES AND A BIG YES!!!! This program is designed to enhance not only your technical skills but also your communication skills, particularly in English. Recognizing the pivotal role communication skills play in interviews, our course includes modules and exercises specifically tailored to strengthen your English speaking and communication abilities. So, if you feel your communication skills are a bit weak, worry not â€“ this course is crafted to support your overall professional development, ensuring you are well-prepared to excel in interviews.

data.title: In Which Language, Classes Will Be Conducted?
data: The classes will be conducted in both English and Hindi to cater to the diverse linguistic preferences of our students. This bilingual approach ensures that all participants can comfortably engage with the course content, ask questions, and fully comprehend the material in either English or Hindi based on their preference and comfort level. This inclusive language policy aims to create an accessible and supportive learning environment for everyone enrolled in the program.

data.title: What If You Missed A Class?
data: If you happen to miss a class, don't worry! You'll have the flexibility to catch up by accessing the recorded sessions at any time. This means you can revisit the class content whenever it's convenient for you. We understand that life can get busy, so the recorded sessions are there to ensure you don't miss out on any valuable information or insights shared during the live classes. Your learning experience remains flexible, allowing you to pace yourself and review the material at your own convenience.

data.title: Will all enrolled students be eligible for guaranteed interview opportunities?
data: Certainly! Every student who enrolls in our program is entitled to receive valuable opportunities. You will receive one guaranteed interview opportunity, and if you excel in the Skill Based Test, you can unlock two additional interview opportunities. It's important to note that attempting the Skill based Test is a mandatory step to qualify for these interview opportunities. To be eligible for the test, you need to be at least a 12th Pass with an age not exceeding 35 years. If you are above 35 years, you can still benefit from our learning program, but you won't be eligible for guaranteed interviews. However, the program equips you with the skills to connect with recruiters hiring candidates above 35 years. Whether you are a 12th Pass, college student, graduate, or anyone else, this 21 Days Job Ready Program empowers you to explore job opportunities, create a professional resume, and establish direct contact with HR professionals. Your learning journey is tailored to enhance your employability and career prospects.

data.title: Is their any refund policy in this program?
data: Unfortunately, we do not have a refund policy for any of the courses listed on our website. Once you enroll in a course, the fees are non-refundable. It's essential to consider this policy before making a decision to ensure that it aligns with your preferences and expectations.
